stories.storyText:
[Code Name] Sora
[Gender] Female 
[Combat Experience] None 
[Place of Birth] Unknown as requested by management agency 
[Date of Birth] Sep. 12 
[Race] Unknown as requested by management agency 
[Height] 155cm 
[Infection Status] 
Non-infected as confirmed by medical report.

[Physical Strength] Normal 
[Mobility] Normal 
[Physical Resilience] Normal 
[Tactical Acumen] Standard 
[Combat Skill] Standard 
[Originium Arts Assimilation] Excellent

For reasons unknown, this active idol is currently boarding with Penguin Logistics. After Penguin Logistics formed a partnership with Rhodes Island, Sora also became a Rhodes Island Operator.
She is able to naturally channel her Originium Arts through her voice to support allies with her unique songs on the battlefield.

Imaging tests reveal clear, normal outlines of internal organs, and no abnormal shadows have been detected. Originium granules have not been detected in the circulatory system and there is no sign of infection. At this time, this Operator is believed to be non-infected. 

[Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0% 
Operator Sora showed no symptoms of Oripathy. 

[Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.12u/L 
Operator Sora rarely comes into contact with Originium.

A minor celebrity/pop idol girl in Lungmen. 
Cute, playful, vivacious, the epitome of the word 'girl.' 
Still cannot strike a balance between being an idol and an Operator, but is making strides.

Miss Sora could've chosen a more conventional fighting style, but at her own insistence, Dr. Kal'tsit ultimately designed a custom program for her to better develop her natural talent. 
To her credit, Sora put in way more effort than a typical support Operator. Anyone would admit that she was practically born to sing, and the results of this program surpassed all expectations. 
Of course, someone who sings on a battlefield draws plenty of enemy attention, so Sora requires more bodyguards than usual. However, she is certainly worth the strategic compromise.

Penguin Logistics naturally had to 'negotiate' with Sora's management agency in order to allow a pop idol to become a courier. 
Given that a codename was also part of the package, it's fair to assume that the 'negotiation' wasn't conventional at all, because no agency in its right mind would expose its valuable asset to potential harm without getting something in return. 
Rhodes Island is a fair operation, and for the other party to make such a great compromise, Penguin Logistics certainly would pay a huge cost without any underhanded coercion. 
Then, what is the cost for Sora to become a PL Operator while retaining her pop idol status? The official contract is too long and complicated to go into here, though it could probably be summed up in three clauses: 
One, Penguin Logistics is responsible for Sora's personal safety, and must not let her make any appearance that would damage her image as a pop idol. 
Two, wherever Sora goes on a mission, Penguin Logistics is obligated to do their best to promote her and increase her popularity as they see fit, as well as absorbing all costs incurred. 
Three, including events or activities described in Clause 2, all revenue derived from Sora's performance as an entertainer must go to the management agency. 
Violation of any clause is ground for the agency to terminate the contract to revoke Sora as an Operator. 
Following PL's partnership with Rhodes Island, the latter also assumed all the obligations. After all, who wouldn't want a girl as adorable as Sora to be the biggest star in the world?

People always ask: Maybe Sora is a good entertainer, but is she a good Operator? 
The answer is affirmative. 
She's not too hung up about needing someone to protect her, nor does she wallow in self-pity over not able to defend others with a weapon. She knows her limits and stays within them. No one has to worry about that. 
However, that doesn't mean she wishes harm to come to those who guard her, nor does it mean she refuses to pick up arms in defense of others. She's no good at it, but that doesn't keep her from trying. 
Every day between practice sessions, Sora clumsily trains her weapon proficiency, hoping to contribute a bit more in battle. 
It's thoughts like that which truly make Sora special.

That Sora lass, she managed to fool her fans with impeccable illusions, making them believe she's Lupo. 
Perhaps she thought she'd stand out as a Lupo? That does make sense from the trendy perspective... 
And that kid, I've seen idols before and they didn't impress me. But then Sora came along and I finally understood why some people worship stars. 
Anyway, I taught her an even better way of concealment, usable at any time, so she won't ever need to try to cover her own identity anymore. 
Also, I shall design more attire for her to help further her career. 
—Orchid

trait.overrideDescription: Does not attack but continuously restores the <@ba.kw>HP</> of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to <@ba.kw>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of self ATK). Self is unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</>

skins.description:
An outfit commonly worn by Operators.
While not as practical as a uniform, it's what they find most comfortable.

An outfit that has been improved after the Operator's Promotion.
Custom-made to suit each Operator's experiences and needs, these outfits are designed to provide them maximum flexibility on any battlefield. Furthermore, this is all done without compromising the comfort that they've come to expect.

<color name=#ffffff>EPOQUE Collection New Arrivals/Melodiosa. Sora's outfit in her time studying and performing at Siracusa's Teatro di Milano. Siracusan musical productions have a unique cultural flair, which in turn calls for accessorizing to match.</color>
MARTHE [Coral Coast] Summer Flowers Series FA361. Brings out a girl's figure and physique using all-natural materials. Pursue this summer's hottest trend.

skills.desc: Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, all enemies within Attack Range are put to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</>, and the healing effect of this unit's Trait is <@ba.vup>increased to {attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</>
All other ally units within Attack Range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to <@ba.vup>{atk:0%}</> of this unit's ATK

modules.desc:
Operator Sora has demonstrated a remarkable aptitude for tactical support and low-level therapy of operators within proximity.
The Field Operations Department has thus passed the following resolution:
This operator shall be appointed a Supporter Operator during field operations to exercise Bard responsibilities.
In witness whereof,
This badge is hereby conferred upon the above named.

A silver nanny van enters a Penguin Logistics safehouse's closest dropoff point. Cases big and small are hauled out from it.
Clearly, their owner plans to stick around for the long haul. Once every case is finally inside, a Lupo who's been waiting around saunters by the pop idol, stoops down, and nabs a pair of plastic sticks out of an open cardboard box.
'If I'm remembering right... these are glowsticks for the fans?'
'—Huh? Uh, yeah, a fan sent me these. Texas, how come you know what they're for?'
'...I've been to your concerts, and seen your tapes. Hard not to notice all these glowing in a sea of dark.'
'Ohh, I see,' Sora mumbles, casting a brief look around her before returning her gaze.
'So, um, you wanna go to another one? A concert, I mean?'
'When?'
'It could be right here, right now, or maybe tomorrow? I mean, look—' Sora pulls away from the glowsticks, and points around at the boxes. 'This is everything you need to hold a concert, everything you need to live as an idol.'
'I was bringing all of this here... so I could invite you, all of you, to an exclusive show for Penguin Logistics!'
The stage is erected from cardboard boxes, the loudspeakers and panel lighting propped high on the package shelves. Sora includes every hit single from each of her albums in the setlist, pouring her heart and soul, all her thanks, all her passion, and all her most beautiful wishes into her singing and dancing. Aside from the stage size and audience numbers, this concert's no different from the rest, nor is the support from her fans...
...Wait wait wait, what's going on?
Sora's eyes grow wide—Exusiai's using her rifle to shoot at the metal plates hung on either side, the sound bright and clear and somehow keeping perfectly in time with the music; Croissant's next to her banging her maracas on her shield; even Texas is using her sword stance to brandish her glowsticks, her expression stern and serious as ever, making the gap all the more hilarious.
Only Emperor sits aloof in this absurd scene, listening silently and intently, like he's the only one actually concentrating on being a spectator.
Sora almost hears the canned audience laughter play in her head, and she cracks up too. This concert is everyone's concert, the chorus of Penguin Logistics.

'I think that was the most unforgettable concert I've ever had.'
'Shucks, Sora, ya go and hold such a special performance just fer us, s'obvious we gotta give somethin' back somehow. Ain't that so, Baws?'
'All I can say is, not bad for bubblegum pop.'
'I think I'mma translate for him: Sora, you sing MIGHTY fine!'
'Yeah. It was amazing.'
'And don't forget, our accompaniment was spot on too!'
At first, Sora shakes her head, then nods, and keeps nodding. She grins, and with all the gratitude she has, runs straight into her circle of friends' giant group hug.

missionList.desc: During battle, have your own Sora use Hymn of Battle a total of 8 times
Clear Side Story CB-7 with a 3-star rating; You must deploy your own Sora, and cannot include any other Supporter Operators as members

voice_lines.voiceText: Yahoo, Doctor! Whacha doing? Looks like fun!
Does Rhodes Island have a karaoke place? It'd be great if we had a place to sing the night away, especially when we don't have battles to fight!
My job as an idol is to make the fans happy with my songs and performances. But what should I do as an operator of Rhodes Island... ?
Hi, hi, Doctor! Anything I can help with? Don't judge me by my look— I actually do some heavy lifting at Penguin Logistics.

Yup, my special skill is singing! I can do a cappella, lead vocals, choir singing, pop music, and I can even rap, yo yo! But, I guess that's not a very useful skill for an Operator. If only I had a more practical skill…
M-My ears...? Uh, I can't tell you! A-And even if you ask Texas, she's not going to tell you either! Ehhh—Sorry, I'll explain if I get the chance someday…

You know, Texas actually saved my life. She also taught me so much I never knew. Which is why I... want to be there with her whenever I can... I, uhh, I'm just trying to show my gratitude for her, that's all!
You think I look upset? Um... it's because... Exusiai went on a mission with Texas again, right? If only I were as good as Exusiai…
Doctor! Could you teach me to use a weapon? My songs have no practical use except for support and encouragement. If I could fight with a weapon... What? You're not good at fighting either?!
Texas... are you listening to my song?
(｡･∀･)ﾉﾞHiiii! I'm the loveable idol from Monster Siren Records: Sora! Oops, sorry, introducing myself like this at Rhodes Island must be kinda weird. Aww…
Leveling—up!
A promotion? Do we also have an idol ranking on Rhodes Island?
I can feel the surge in my heart. It's like back to my first concert. I'm just delighted that you trust me so much, Doctor! All my hard work has paid off! Hmm? My ears? Wh-What about them?
As a squad member, I'll try my best to learn from the basics!
I'm the leader? Is that like standing at the center of the idol group?
Singing on the battlefield... Now that's a fresh experience!
If only my music could put an end to all this fighting...
Is it my turn?
Yes, I can handle this!
It's show time!
Alright, let's make some noise!
Come on, we can do it!
You have my full support!
Now we change the game!
Don't lose heart, we can win this one!
I heard your cheering loud and clear, everyone! Thank you!
Awesome! A smashing victory! Texas, did you see how I sparkled on the stage?
We did a good job, team. Thank you for your hard work!
I'm sorry... I wasn't good enough to be your help...
This place is much bigger than the dorms at Penguin Logistics!
Sparkle spark!
Ehehe, thanks, Doctor!
Arknights.

It looks like I can't hold a solo live this year, but that doesn't change my desire to sing. Happy New Year! This year, I'm going to bring even more smiles to my fans—um, no, that's not the word... Oh, right! I'm going to bring even more music to everyone at Rhodes Island!
I hope you have a fantastic day, Doctor!

A lot of fans say my singing can bring people true happiness, and I really hope they're right. Doctor, today I've got a song just for you. Happy birthday! This is for a beautiful life and a cheerful you, all year long!

Idols and Messengers are both jobs about passing on love. Seeing fans and audiences smile is a source of happiness in my own life. I'm sure, together with everyone at Rhodes Island, we can spread this blessing even further. It's a tiny little dream, but I'll do my best to make it come true!

building_skills.desc: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.15</> Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, order acquisition efficiency <@cc.vup>+30%</>
